about.name: Amber Bisht
about.title: DevOps Engineer
about.description:
DevOps isn’t just tools. It’s building systems that ship fast and stay stable.
I design automated pipelines, cloud-native architectures, and resilient platforms.
Reliable delivery, clean code, and thoughtful engineering are what I work toward every day.

projects.title: Automated CI/CD Pipeline
projects.description: Designed and implemented a complete CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins and GitHub Actions. Automated testing, building, and deployment to AWS EC2 instances.

projects.title: Kubernetes Cluster Management
projects.description: Deployed and managed a high-availability Kubernetes cluster on AWS EKS. Configured auto-scaling, monitoring using Prometheus and Grafana, and ingress controllers.

projects.title: Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
projects.description: Provisioned cloud infrastructure using Terraform. Managed VPCs, subnets, security groups, and EC2 instances with state management and modules.

experience.title: Software Intern
experience.description: Contributed to the design and development of a custom internal CRM system using ReactJS for the frontend and NodeJS for the backend, focusing on modular architecture and maintainable code practices. Implemented reusable UI components, integrated RESTful APIs, and collaborated closely with backend services to ensure smooth data flow and performance optimization. Containerized the entire application using Docker, creating consistent and reproducible development, testing, and production environments, which simplified deployments, reduced environment-specific issues, and improved overall release reliability.
